column4: How do you feel about keeping the home directory on another partition and then upgrading the OD that way i.e. never having to touch the home folder
in all honesty  I never do that  so I dont have much expeirence with it... I follow my own advice :)
fair enough, I've been thinking about moving my home folder to it's own partition but I'm being quite lazy about doing it!
yeah on this point you may have to get the advice of someone else  and maybe good advice about that on ##linux channel :)
